item.title: Prayer Altar
item.dc:creator: @octavius octavius
item.description:
@octavius wrote:

How do I get my prayer altar to restore the prayer stat? I can’t find the right code for the prayer… I know it’s skill id is [5]… but I can’t get the complete code to put in the following:

case 409: //pray restore altar if(GoodDistance(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 1) == true) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You restore your' prayer."); actionTimer = 10; setAnimation(811); ---> prayer code would go here.... when I figure it out. stillgfx(76, absY, absX); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;
